predicate.note: Frames file for 'victimize' based on sentences in wsj and automatic expansion via verbnet.

roleset.name: make into a victim

example.name: only passive examples
example.text: Almost all of us in comparable circumstances might be victimized *trace* in some way,'' says Jerald Jellison, a psychology professor at the University of Southern California in Los Angeles.
example.arg: *trace* -> Almost all of us in comparable circumstances

roleset.note: I really doubt the 'grounds' arg would ever occur; it doesn't sound natural to me. It's here only for sake of coherence within the verbnet class (although perhaps this could be justification for splitting the class).
